group_1.textLeft: Those who like sweet mochi, come on over@to this group.
We have soybean flour with black honey, sesame@seeds, walnuts, and of course, red bean paste!

group_1.textRight: ...I-I'm terribly sorry, we invited you here@and yet had you help us.

group_1.textLeft: I've gotten to eat so many delectable things, and@everyone is enjoying themselves.
[chara:303401:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Mmm~~! So good...!@And I can eat as many as I want...

group_1.textRight: Sweets are every girl's dream after all...

group_1.textLeft: ...Last time, did you not call them the sworn enemy@of dieting?

group_1.textRight: It's...@You know, a real delicious dilemma.
Anyway, what do you think? Have you taken@a liking to the red bean paste?

group_1.textLeft: ...The wisdom of the olden days is admirable.@I don't know if I like it, though...

group_1.textRight: If that's your answer, you'll have to eat@more and more!
There's a chance you might find one you really love.
Alright, shall we try the classic soybean flour next?

group_1.textLeft: Ah...please be careful with the soybean flour...
I...often inhale it and start choking...
It's pretty difficult to eat without spilling the@sesame seeds or the walnuts too.

group_1.textRight: When you're wearing something pretty and@you spill all over it is just THE WORST...

group_1.textLeft: And it adds even more work before you start@the laundry...

group_1.textRight: I know that all too well...@I've had to do heavy cleaning before...
